original_title: Dead Butterfly: The Prophecy of Suffering Bible
overview: An angel trapped between the world of light and the world of the flesh, lost in a hell of avid and insane souls, a prey to their desires. A movie in five acts. The path of humanity, between birth and death, in the dark ocean of sin where we aren't but castaways clinging to the madness of our choices
title: Dead Butterfly: The Prophecy of Suffering Bible
